channel.title: Afternoon Groove Radio Pres. the NuSoul Automation
channel.description:
The Afternoon Groove (www.afternoongrooveradio.com) is about quality soul music. Soul music is a universal thing. It’s music with emotion and feeling. It’s deep and sometimes political. It’s joy and pain. It’s anger, fear, and even confusion. Sometimes it can be just plain funny. It’s the total human experience. It’s life.
Inside of the Afternoon Groove you will get a mixture of music from known and unknown artists covering different forms of modern soul music from around the world as well as a few classics thrown in for good measure.
Enjoy the NuSoul Automation podcast as broadcast on Radio Laser 95.9 in Rennes, France.
Peace & good music!
channel.itunes:subtitle: The NuSoul Revolution Continues...
channel.itunes:author: Qwiet Bwoy
channel.itunes:summary:
The Afternoon Groove (www.afternoongrooveradio.com) is about quality soul music. Soul music is a universal thing. It’s music with emotion and feeling. It’s deep and sometimes political. It’s joy and pain. It’s anger, fear, and even confusion. Sometimes it can be just plain funny. It’s the total human experience. It’s life.
Inside of the Afternoon Groove you will get a mixture of music from known and unknown artists covering different forms of modern soul music from around the world as well as a few classics thrown in for good measure.
Enjoy the NuSoul Automation podcast as broadcast on Radio Laser 95.9 in Rennes, France.
Peace & good music!

item.title: Nusoul Automation 161_NuSoul Mix
item.description: 1. Still (DJ Kemit & Ahmed Sirour Remix)-Eric Roberson 2. Girlfriend-Jay Electronica 3. Vibrate On-Erykah Badu 4. Keep Trying-BusCrates 16 Bit Ensemble 5. Something Forever-Slakah the Beatchild 6. Raw Jazz-Dexter 7. He Don't Want It-Ayah 8. Before 1st-Iman Williams & Bobby Blunt 9. Look of Love pt.6 (Rusic ReMake)-Slum Village 10. Inner Love (Samba)-Ty 11. Eu Quero Ver-Steppah Huntah 12. La Revolucion De Cuerpo (Let's Go TBG Remix)-Giles Peterson 13. Dancing-Electric Conversation 14. Save-Domu ft. Face 15. Brazilian Skies-Bill Summers 16. Red Waters-Middlewood Sessions 17. Gwotet (Osunalde Remix)-David Murray 18. Take Yo Time (Original Mix)-Tony Lionni **I will post the extended mix at a later time. Enjoy but please support these artists. One in Music. www.afternoongrooveradio.com

item.title: Nusoul Automation 160_Lisa Zure Special
item.description: The NuSoul Automation returns this week with Lisa Zure as our special guest host. Lisa features musical selections from her album and gives you an inside look at the making of certain tracks. You can find out more information on Lisa Zure at www.lisazure.com. Playlist 1. Sweet Fruit-Lisa Zure 2. Fatal Lovesick Journey-Joi 3. Be Your Man-Zo! feat. Darrien Brockington 4. Get It On-Darrius Willrich 5. Baby, This Love I Have-Aaries 6. Sweet Fruit (Remix)-Lisa Zure ft. John Pecos 7. Mount Zion-Coultrain 8. Sail Away-Dezeray Dawn 9. What You Do-Nonameko 10. Closer 2 Me-Gyptian Ft. Lisa Zure 11. On My Way-JoGoldie 12. Darker Than Blue-Andreya Triana 13. Participant-Homecut 14. B Wit U-Lisa Zure 15. Serene Sister-Domu Check out our other podcast www.dastorm.podomatic.com if you like deep soulful dance music. As always, enjoy the music but please support these artists. One in Music. www.afternoongrooveradio.com
item.dc:creator: Qwiet Bwoy

item.title: Nusoul Automation 158_Groove Parlor TV_Steve Miggedy Maestro
item.description: We are back after a brief hiatus of sorts on the podcast front. This time we have special guest hosts Paula Harris from Groove Parlor TV (www.grooveparlortv.com) and DJ Steve "Miggedy" Maestro taking over the show and bringing you some quality sounds. As always, listen, enjoy, but please support these artists. One Love, www.afternoongrooveradio.com Special Guest Host: Paula Harris of Groove Parlor TV 1. Repercussions-Lauryn Hill 2. Float Away-Iman Williams ft. Porshay Smith 3. Fantasic(remix) -Georgia Anne Muldrow & Miquel Atwood-Ferguson 4. Hideaway-Dezeray Dawn 5. Not Coming Downl-Mr. Wol 6. Love With Respect-Teodress Avery ft. Shannone Holt 7. Float Away-Teodress Avery 8. Constant Questions-Silhouette Brown 9. Chicago-Roy Ayers 10. Lies-GQ 11. Judgemental-Cherisse NuSoul Mix - Steve "miggedy" Maestro 13. Feel The Real-Adrenaline 14. Yemaya-Osunlade 15. Waterbed-Herbie Man 16. I Am Your Mind Pt.II-Roy Ayers 17. Reach Inside-Bah Samba 18. Street Dance - Fatback Band 19. Journey to the Sun-Sunburst Band 20. Delve Deeper-Liam C & Jenny Fu

item.title: Nusoul Automation 157
item.description: Here is a new edition of the NuSoul Automation. We like good music and we know that you like good music too or you wouldn't be checking out this podcast. item.title: Nusoul Automation 156_Iman Williams Special
item.description: The very beautiful & talented Iman Williams hosts this edition of the NuSoul Automation featuring a few new tunes from her new album. Enjoy but make sure that you support Iman and all of the artists included in this show. You can find more info about Iman Williams at http://www.reverbnation.com/imanbwilliams & http://www.myspace.com/theimanwilliamsproject. One. www.afternoongrooveradio.com Playlist 1. Soulmate-Iman Williams ft. Ab 2. Missing You-????? (Will post later-sorry) 3. Mountains and Molehills-PJ Morton 4. Ordinary Love-Iman Williams 5. Potential-Jsoul ft. Eric Roberson 6. Heartless-Carmen Rogers 7. Float Away-Iman Williams ft. Porshe Smith 8. Liquid Sounds-Jaspects ft. PJ Morton 9. Window Seat-Erykah Badu 10. Power Master-Green Tea 11. Blindspot-Roddy Rodd ft. Wayna 12. Why Dontcha Call Me No More-Yazerah 13. She Knows-Reggie B

item.title: Nusoul Automation 151_02_03_10
item.description: Back with more quality sounds including a short tribute to Teddy Pendergrass (with a few interview clips from the Teddy: Live Coast to Coast album). Enjoy but make sure you support these artists. RIP Teddy Pendergrass. 1. Wake Up Everybody-Harold Melvin & The Blue Notes 2. I Miss You-Harold Melvin & The Blue Notes 3. It's You I Love-Teddy Pendergrass 4. Close The Door (Live)-Teddy Pendergrass 5. Turn Off The Lights (Live)-Teddy Pendergrass 6. We Can-Toi Horn 7. Constant Questions-Silohette Brown 8. Day Day Day (loungin' Remix)-Lizz Fields 9. Plan A-Reign Starr/Daru Beats ft. Tony Ozier 10. Yo Yo Affair Pt.1-Madlib feat. Frezna www.afternoongrooveradio.com

item.title: Nusoul Automation 149_12_09_09

Yazarah 3. 3 Africans-Nneka 4. Rising-Somi 5. Dance-Fertile Ground 6. Happy People-Incognito 7. Find Your Way-The Repercussions 8. ?????-????? 9. Pusherman-Ben Westbeech 10. Slaam-Lorett Fleur 17. Goodbye-Nefarious Please enjoy but support these artists. www.afternoongrooveradio.com Soulful dance music you like aye? Check out www.dastorm.podomatic.com.

item.title: Nusoul Automation 147_11_11_09
item.description: Modern and progressive soul that gets your head right and touches the senses is what you will get on the NuSoul Automation inside of the Afternoon Groove Radio Show. Listen, enjoy but please support these artists. 1. Unconditional-Michael Olatuja ft. Alicia Olatuja 2. Soul Kiss-Lee Wilson ft. Mos Def 3. Mountains & Valleys-Teisha Marie 4. Pages-Femi 5. Is It To Late-African Hi-Tec 6. City Of Nowhere-Brittany Bosco 7. The Way That I Live-Madlib fr. Stacey Epps 8. Track 14-Mr. Keyes NuSoul MIx Mixer: DJ Vinnie V 1. Forever-Nuwamba 2. Doing Dirty-Yolanda 3. Are You Ready- DJ Jazzy Jeff/Slum Village/J Dilla 4. Dust & Kisses-Shafiq feat. Noni Limar 5. Spaceman (I'm In Space)=The Grand Ear 6. Get Out Of My Hair-Bilal 7. Vibe Change-Electric Conversation 8. Mediocre-Voice 9. Point Blank-The Astronotes 10. Promised Land-Joy Jones Peace. www.afternoongrooveradio.com ** If you like soulful dance grooves than you need to check out our other podacast at www.dastorm.podomatic.com.

item.title: Nusoul Automation 144_10_14_09
item.description: We're back! More grooves from the soul for your soul. Lots of treats for your listening pleasure, but as we always say...SUPPORT THESE ARTISTS!!!! This week's musical stew... 1. Further-Eric Roberson 2. Weekend-Rachel Brown 3. What's Still Going On-V 4. Move Me-Kissy Asplund 5. Concoon-Bilal Salaam 6. Super Heroes (Afta-1 Remix)-Estereo 7. Can't Hardly Wait-N'Dambi 8. (Still) By Your Side-Big LA 9. Embrace-Shae Fiol 10. Jazz Rooms-Kelsey James 11. We Make The Rules-J Rawls & John Robinson Pres. Jay Are feat. Rashad & Tiffany Paige 12. If It Is So-Kamal The Abstract 13. How Ya Doin' Yah (Jazzy Tofu Mix)-Ramona 14. Shibuya Station-Nicolay www.afternoongrooveradio.com Like soulful dance music? Than you just have to check out are other podcast www.dastorm.podomatic.com.
item.dc:creator: Qwiet Bwoy
item.itunes:summary:
We're back! More grooves from the soul for your soul. Lots of treats for your listening pleasure, but as we always say...SUPPORT THESE ARTISTS!!!!
This week's musical stew...
1. Further-Eric Roberson 2. Weekend-Rachel Brown 3. What's Still Going On-V 4. Move Me-Kissy Asplund 5. Concoon-Bilal Salaam 6. Super Heroes (Afta-1 Remix)-Estereo 7. Can't Hardly Wait-N'Dambi 8. item.title: Nusoul Automation 143_7_08_09
item.description: Here is another sweet sounding soulful edition of the NuSoul Automation. Lots of good quality sounds and a little thirty minute tribute to the King of Pop the late Michael Jackson. We will do a bigger tribute to MJ at a later time. Enjoy these artists music but enjoy responsibly by attending their performances & purchasing their music. What was played: 1st Hour - NuSoul Automation 1. My Special-Trizonna McClendon 2. Lady Sunday-Xavier Combs 3. Love Affair-Soul Folk 4. Believe-Ayah 5. Love Today-Sa-Ra Creative Partners 6. All Of Me-Swell Session ft. Mark de Clive-Lowe 7. Revelations-Big La 8. I'm Glad You Came-Jackson 5 9. Rock With You-Michael Jackson 10. Butterflies-Michael Jackson 11. Human Nature-Michael Jackson 12. I Can't Help It (Tangotereje Mix)-Michael Jackson 13. I Wanna Be Where You Are-The Roots & Erykah Badu www.afternoongrooveradio.com
item.dc:creator: Qwiet Bwoy
item.itunes:summary:
Here is another sweet sounding soulful edition of the NuSoul Automation. Lots of good quality sounds and a little thirty minute tribute to the King of Pop the late Michael Jackson. We will do a bigger tribute to MJ at a later time. Enjoy these artists music but enjoy responsibly by attending their performances & purchasing their music.
What was played:
1st Hour - NuSoul Automation
1. My Special-Trizonna McClendon 2. Lady Sunday-Xavier Combs 3. Love Affair-Soul Folk 4. Believe-Ayah 5. Love Today-Sa-Ra Creative Partners 6. All Of Me-Swell Session ft. Mark de Clive-Lowe 7. Revelations-Big La 8. I'm Glad You Came-Jackson 5 9. Rock With You-Michael Jackson 10. Butterflies-Michael Jackson 11. Human Nature-Michael Jackson 12.
